00054 ParallelMeshImpl::ParallelMeshImpl(Mesh* myMesh, const char * gid_name, const char * pid_name)
00055 {
00056   MsqError err;
00057 
00058   this->myMesh = myMesh;
00059   this->helper = 0;
00060 
00061   if (gid_name)
00062     gid_tag = myMesh->tag_get(gid_name, err);
00063   else
00064     gid_tag = 0;
00065 
00066   if (pid_name)
00067     pid_tag = myMesh->tag_get(pid_name, err);
00068   else
00069     pid_tag = 0;
00070 }
00071 
00072 void ParallelMeshImpl::set_global_id_tag(const char * name, MsqError& err)
00073 {
00074   gid_tag = myMesh->tag_get(name, err);
00075 }
00076 
00077 void ParallelMeshImpl::set_processor_id_tag(const char * name, MsqError& err)
00078 {
00079   pid_tag = myMesh->tag_get(name, err);
00080 }

00083 
00084 void ParallelMeshImpl::vertices_get_global_id(const VertexHandle vert_array[],
00085                                               size_t gid[],
00086                                               size_t num_vtx,
00087                                               MsqError& err)
00088 {
00089   if (gid_tag)
00090   {
00091     myMesh->tag_get_vertex_data(gid_tag, num_vtx, vert_array, gid, err);
00092     MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00093   }
00094   else
00095   {
00096     MSQ_SETERR(err)( "Parallel mesh does not have Global IDs.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00097   }
00098 }
00099 
00100 void ParallelMeshImpl::vertices_set_global_id(const VertexHandle vert_array[],
00101                                               size_t gid[],
00102                                               size_t num_vtx,
00103                                               MsqError& err)
00104 {
00105   if (gid_tag == 0)
00106   {
00107     const char GLOBAL_ID_NAME[] = "GLOBAL_ID";
00108 
00109     int default_gid = -1;
00110     gid_tag = tag_create( GLOBAL_ID_NAME, HANDLE, 1, &default_gid, err );
00111       // the 'HANDLE' is the type of data to store
00112       // the '1' is for one value per vertex
00113       // NULL for no default value, if you want them all
00114       // initialized to something, pass in a pointer to an int
00115       // with the value.
00116     MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00117   }
00118 
00119   tag_set_vertex_data( gid_tag, num_vtx, vert_array, gid, err );
00120   MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00121 }
00122      
00123 void ParallelMeshImpl::vertices_get_processor_id(const VertexHandle vert_array[],
00124                                                  int pid[],
00125                                                  size_t num_vtx,
00126                                                  MsqError& err)
00127 {
00128   if (pid_tag)
00129   {
00130     tag_get_vertex_data( pid_tag, num_vtx, vert_array, pid, err );
00131     MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00132   }
00133   else
00134   {
00135     MSQ_SETERR(err)( "Parallel mesh does not have Processor IDs.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00136   }
00137 }
00138 
00139 void ParallelMeshImpl::vertices_set_processor_id(const VertexHandle vert_array[],
00140                                                  int pid[],
00141                                                  size_t num_vtx,
00142                                                  MsqError& err)
00143 {
00144   if (pid_tag == 0)
00145   {
00146     const char PROCESSOR_ID_NAME[] = "PROCESSOR_ID";
00147 
00148     int default_pid = -1;
00149     pid_tag = tag_create( PROCESSOR_ID_NAME, INT, 1, &default_pid, err );
00150       // the 'INT' is the type of data to store
00151       // the '1' is for one value per vertex
00152       // NULL for no default value, if you want them all
00153       // initialized to something, pass in a pointer to an int
00154       // with the value.
00155     MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00156   }
00157 
00158   tag_set_vertex_data( pid_tag, num_vtx, vert_array, pid, err );
00159   MSQ_CHKERR(err); 
00160 }
